title: The Influential Americans
creator_credit: Arthur D Morse, Carousel Films and CBS
brief_description: A report on bold new experiments in the utilization of above-average teachers. Shows new teaching techniques and experiments. Intended to focus attention on the role of gifted school teachers and some of the methods currently used to solve major educational problems.
creator_credit_for_label: Arthur D Morse, Carousel Films and CBS
